page.title: 10Industry in Dundrennan
page.content: Galloway boats and Mouldings is the only industrial building in the whole of Dundrennan.It specialises in making things out of fibre glass like sheep dips,canopies for pick ups,gutters,egg white tanks and a few boats. The factory was founded ten years ago in Kirkcudbright,but it moved to Dundrennan about five years later. About 20 men work there and two of these men take goods to different parts of the country.Sometimes they get orders from foreign countries. In the factory there are a lot of compressed air machines which are usually used for cutting fibre glass and wood.The process of making anything at the factory is,first to make a mould,then put fibre glass in it,leave it to set and finally remove the mould and you will have the shape you want.
